data.event: The patron of Tuy is Saint Vincent Ferrer, the patron of construction workers, whose feast day is celebrated on May 8.

event.title: toasted bread, among other bakery products, since the 1960s

data.event: Tuy has also been producing famous bakery products of its own, like the so-called jacobina biscuits and biscocho toasted bread, among other bakery products, since the 1960s.

event.title: became an independent town only on August 12, 1866

data.event: It became an independent town only on August 12, 1866.
